meanings.definition: The world or domain of the film industry.
meanings.sent1: In the screenlands, actors and directors work together to create movies.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of working in the screenlands and becoming famous.
meanings.sent3: The screenlands can sometimes feel like a magical place where stories come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast screenlands where endless stories played out.
meanings.sent5: The screenlands shimmered with the promise of adventure and imagination.

meanings.definition: The area or region where movies are produced or filmed.
meanings.sent1: The screenlands in Hollywood are known for their glamorous studios.
meanings.sent2: Visiting the screenlands where famous movies were made was a dream come true.
meanings.sent3: The screenlands seemed to have a charm that made even the most ordinary scenes look extraordinary.
meanings.sent4: Her hometown transformed into a bustling screenlands during the filming of a blockbuster movie.
meanings.sent5: The screenlands echoed with the sounds of cameras rolling and actors rehearsing.
